6044.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
6044.verse-english: By the sun and its brightness

clauses-arabic.clause: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا

clauses-english.clause: By the sun and its brightness

6045.verse-english: And [by] the moon when it follows it

clauses-english.clause: And [by] the moon when it follows it

6046.verse-english: And [by] the day when it displays it

clauses-english.clause: And [by] the day when it displays it

6047.verse-english: And [by] the night when it covers it

clauses-english.clause: And [by] the night when it covers it

6048.verse-english: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

clauses-english.clause: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

6049.verse-english: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

clauses-english.clause: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

6050.verse-english: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

clauses-english.clause: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

6051.verse-english: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

clauses-english.clause: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

6052.verse-english: He has succeeded who purifies it,

clauses-english.clause: He has succeeded who purifies it,

6053.verse-english: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

clauses-english.clause: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

6054.verse-english: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

clauses-english.clause: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

6055.verse-english: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

clauses-english.clause: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

6056.verse-arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
6056.verse-english: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

clauses-english.clause: And the messenger of God [Salih] said to them,
camel of God or [prevent her from] her drink.

6057.verse-arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
6057.verse-english: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

clauses-english.clause: But they denied him and hamstrung her.
So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

6058.verse-english: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

clauses-english.clause: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
